List<String> reportIDList = new List<String>{'reportID0','reportID1','reportID2','reportID3','reportID4'};

String sourceType = 'reportSourceType' ;
String ssReportID = 'successSnapshotID';

List<String> dashboardTypes = new List<String>{'{"displayType":"Section Header"}','{"displayType":"Title Slide"}','{"displayType":"Title and Content"}','{"displayType":"Two Content"}','{"displayType":"Comparison"}'};

//List<JBCXM__Dashboard__C> dashboardNames = [Select ID,JBCXM__FilterConditions__c from JBCXM__Dashboard__C];

List<JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c> pbr11 = new List<JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c>();

//List<String> sectionHeaderContainerInfoList = new List<String>{'{"variableList":[],"content":"Section Header Slide"}','{"variableList":[]//,"content":"Section Header Slide Footer"}'};

//List<String> sectionHeaderContainerOptionsList = new List<String>{'{"shapeName":"Title 1","placeHolder":"title"}','{"shapeName":"Text //Placeholder 2","placeHolder":"body"}'};

Map<String,Map<String,String>> sectionSlideDBTypesMap = new Map<String,Map<String,String>> {
			'{"displayType":"Section Header"}' => new Map<String,String>{
					'{"shapeName":"Title 1","placeHolder":"title"}' => '{"variableList":[],"content":"Section Header Slide"}',
					'{"shapeName":"Text Placeholder 2","placeHolder":"body"}' => '{"variableList":[],"content":"Section Header Slide Footer"}'
				},
			'{"displayType":"Title and Content"}' => new Map<String,String>{
					'{"shapeName":"Title 1","placeHolder":"title"}'=>'{"variableList":[],"content":"Title and Content Slide Title"}',
					'{"shapeName":"Content Placeholder 2","placeHolder":"content"}'=>'{"having":null,"where":null,"enableCustomerFilter":false,"rowsPerSlide":10,"isRB":true,"selectedColumns":null}'
				},
			'{"displayType":"Title Slide"}' => new Map<String,String>{
					'{"shapeName":"Title 1","placeHolder":"centered_title"}'=>'{"variableList":[],"content":"Title Slide - Title"}',
					'{"shapeName":"Subtitle 2","placeHolder":"subtitle"}'=>'{"variableList":[],"content":"Title Slide - Title Footer"}'
				},
			'{"displayType":"Two Content"}' => new Map<String,String>{
					'{"shapeName":"Title 1","placeHolder":"title"}'=>'{"variableList":[],"content":"Two Content Slide title"}',
					'{"shapeName":"Content Placeholder 2","placeHolder":"content"}'=>'{"having":null,"where":null,"enableCustomerFilter":false,"rowsPerSlide":10,"isRB":true,"selectedColumns":[{"width":32.89473684210527,"decimalPlaces":0,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"isGroupable":false,"fieldType":"DOUBLE","objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","visibilityMode":true,"displayOrder":1,"label":"Age","name":"JBCXM__Age__c"}]}',
					'{"shapeName":"Content Placeholder 3","placeHolder":"content"}' => '{"having":null,"where":null,"enableCustomerFilter":false,"rowsPerSlide":10,"isRB":true,"selectedColumns":null}'
			},
			'{"displayType":"Comparison"}' => new Map<String,String>{
					'{"shapeName":"Title 1","placeHolder":"title"}'=>'{"variableList":[],"content":"Comparision Slide Title"}',
					'{"shapeName":"Text Placeholder 2","placeHolder":"body"}' => '{"variableList":[],"content":"Comp Report1"}',
					'{"shapeName":"Content Placeholder 3","placeHolder":"content"}' => '{"having":null,"where":null,"enableCustomerFilter":false,"rowsPerSlide":10,"isRB":true,"selectedColumns":[{"width":33.003300330033,"decimalPlaces":0,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"isGroupable":false,"fieldType":"DOUBLE","objectName":"JBCXM__CTA__c","visibilityMode":true,"displayOrder":1,"label":"Age","name":"JBCXM__Age__c"}]}',
					'{"shapeName":"Text Placeholder 4","placeHolder":"body"}' => '{"variableList":[],"content":"Comp Report2"}',
					'{"shapeName":"Content Placeholder 5","placeHolder":"content"}' => '{"having":null,"where":null,"enableCustomerFilter":false,"rowsPerSlide":10,"isRB":true,"selectedColumns":null}'
			}

		};
//Delete[Select id from JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c where name ='Test SS Dashboard Container Name'];

//Have Map for each slide type
Decimal d;
Integer reportIterator=0;
Map<String, ID> dBIdByTitle = new Map<String, ID>();
for(JBCXM__Dashboard__C dBObject: [Select ID,JBCXM__FilterConditions__c from JBCXM__Dashboard__C where Name IN: dashboardTypes and JBCXM__ReportSection__r.JBCXM__Report__c =: ssReportID]){
	dBIdByTitle.put(dBObject.JBCXM__FilterConditions__c, dBObject.Id);
}
Map<String,String> dbContainersMap;
JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c viewObj11;
for(String dbType : dBIdByTitle.keySet()){
	dbContainersMap = sectionSlideDBTypesMap.get(dbType);

	dbContainersMap = (dbContainersMap!=null)? dbContainersMap: new Map<String,String>();
	d=0.0;
	for(String cinfo : dbContainersMap.keySet()){
		viewObj11 = new JBCXM__DashboardContainer__c(
				JBCXM__ContainerInfo__c = dbContainersMap.get(cinfo),
				JBCXM__ContainerOptions__c = cinfo,
		        Name = 'Test SS Dashboard Container Name',
				JBCXM__ContainerType__c = 'TEXT',
				JBCXM__Dashboard__c = dBIdByTitle.get(dbType),
				JBCXM__DisplayOrder__c = d,
				JBCXM__SourceType__c=sourceType,
				JBCXM__UIView__c=null,
				JBCXM__SourceId__c= null
				);
		if(cinfo.contains('title')|| cinfo.contains('body')|| cinfo.contains('subtitle')){
				viewObj11.JBCXM__ContainerType__c = 'TEXT';
				viewObj11.JBCXM__SourceId__c=null;
				viewObj11.JBCXM__SourceType__c=null;
				viewObj11.JBCXM__UIView__c=null;
		}else if(cinfo.contains('content')){
		        if(sourceType == 'SFDC'){
                        viewObj11.JBCXM__SourceId__c=null;
                        viewObj11.JBCXM__UIView__c=reportIDList.get(reportIterator);
                }else if(sourceType == 'MDA'){
                        viewObj11.JBCXM__UIView__c= null;
                        viewObj11.JBCXM__SourceId__c= reportIDList.get(reportIterator);
                }
				viewObj11.JBCXM__ContainerType__c = 'CHART';
				reportIterator++;
				}

			pbr11.add(viewObj11);
			d=d+1.0;

		}
	}
insert pbr11;
